content: here s an easy winter hat you can crochet using the crunch stitch and a single_crochet ribbing it s a nice and warm hat that works great especially in the cooler weather it can work great for a child teen woman or man the pompom is optional but i think it s a cute addition stitches used in this pattern include the chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet and slip_stitch slip_stitch the crochet hook used is a size h 5 mm the yarn is red heart s heat wave yarn which is sunlight activated and can keep you up to 12 degrees warmer the sample hat uses the color sandy shores but there are quite a number of other wonderful colors you can choose there is a step-by-step tutorial video for this pattern
